extensionDescription.message: Useful tools for site: Author.Today: dark theme, changing stats of your books, saving and showing found typos.

themeToggleTitle.description: Hint when hovering over the theme switching icon.

typosListTitle.description: Hint when hovering over a typos list icon.

typoIconTitle.message: If you find a typo, please select the text fragment and press this icon or Ctrl+Enter.
typoIconTitle.description: Hint when hovering over a typo icon.

typoDescription.message: Describe the typo in the fragment highlighted with three asterisks (this is optional):
typoDescription.description: A hint when a typo is highlighted.

typoSubmit.message: Click OK to save the typo information.
typoSubmit.description: A hint when a typo is highlighted.

clearConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete all records?
clearConfirm.description: Confirmation of deletion of all records.
